Title: Relates to requiring the school district of East Ramapo to refund to taxpayers excess school taxes collected
Summary: Directs the tax levying body of East Ramapo and the East Ramapo Central School District to refund 2024-2025 school taxes collected as a result of an erroneous assertion that the district was facing a severe budget deficit.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to requiring the school district of East Ramapo to refund to taxpayers excess school taxes collected
